title: Happy November!
author: JGray
text:
I hope everyone had a good Halloween.

And now, you have a better idea of what the exploding goat-frog was all about.

replies.author: Ayra*Guest*
replies.text: I assume that Vitamin XTreme isn't simply sold at the local super-market...?

replies.author: Ayshara*Guest*
replies.text: Of course not, who ever said it would be *That* easy?
